div.p: Mapeamento de Lifestyle Medicine Observation Value Set para LOINC Observation Codes for Lifestyle Medicine
Grupo 1 Mapeamento de Lifestyle Medicine Observation Codes to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

tr.td: No direct LOINC code for consumer fertility device ovulation status as of November 2025. LOINC has laboratory ovulation predictor tests (e.g., LH surge tests) but not consumer device algorithmic ovulation predictions. Consumer apps use basal body temperature + symptom tracking algorithms. Terminology gap between laboratory ovulation testing and consumer fertility tracking.

description.value: Operational ConceptMap for reproductive health terminology translation. Enables runtime $translate operations for semantic interoperability between consumer fertility tracking applications and LOINC standard terminology.

purpose.value: Provides semantic mappings from custom reproductive health codes to standard LOINC codes. Consumer fertility tracking apps capture ovulation status, menstrual cycle data, but use proprietary coding systems.
